description: As a User I want to validate the reservation page
name: Admin regression page load

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional :Verify that the New Order page is rendered correctly

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'

steps.name: I am on the New Order page
I should see that the page header is "New Order"
I should see the market selection dropdown as the first component on the card below the page header
I should see the Travel Button next to the market selection dropdown
I should see the Event Button next to the Travel Button
I should see the Add return single trip radio after the Event Button
The Travel Button in the First Card is clicked
Below the first card I should a second card containing a "Swap Locations" button
In the "firstLayer" of the second card i should see a "From" dropdown and "To" dropdown
In the "secondLayer" of the second card i should see a "Who" dropdown and "when" dropdown
The "Who" and "when" buttons should be disabled by default if the "To" button was not selected
The Cart Section should be visible and have a header with text "Cart"
A "Clear All" Button should be visible beside the header
